text: Bill Noonan (28 February 1918 – 17 September 1980) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). He later played for Oakleigh in the Victorian Football Association (VFA). == Notes == == External links == * *Profile from Collingwood Forever Category:1918 births Category:1980 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:Oakleigh Football Club players
title: Bill Noonan (Australian footballer)
